name: forgetfulme
description: Chrome extension to track websites you've read

scripts.test:visual:report: playwright test tests/visual/ && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:playwright && npm run test:visual
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm test && npm run test:unit:coverage
scripts.quality: npm run check:all && npm run test:playwright && npm run test:visual
scripts.validate:quick: npm run check && npm run test:quick
scripts.validate:full: npm run check && npm test && npm run test:visual:simple
scripts.docker:clean:ps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "docker rmi forgetfulme-test 2>$null; docker system prune -f"
scripts.docker:shell:ps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "docker run --rm -it --user root -v \"${PWD}:/work\" -w /work forgetfulme-test bash"
scripts.docker:test:unit:ps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "docker run --rm -it --user root -v \"${PWD}:/work\" -w /work forgetfulme-test bash -lc 'npm test'"
scripts.docker:test:visual:ps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "docker run --rm -it --user root -v \"${PWD}:/work\" -w /work forgetfulme-test bash -lc 'npm run test:visual'"
scripts.docker:test:visual:update:ps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "docker run --rm -it --user root -v \"${PWD}:/work\" -w /work forgetfulme-test bash -lc 'npm run test:visual:update'"
scripts.docker:test:visual:report:ps: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "docker run --rm -it --user root -v \"${PWD}:/work\" -w /work forgetfulme-test bash -lc 'npm run test:visual:report'"

author: ForgetfulMe Team
